lead_paragraph: A local investor group trying to buy the Nashville Predators canceled a news conference after city officials denied they had reached an agreement on changes to the team’s arena lease. Earlier in the day, the group said it was set to make an announcement after weeks of negotiations with city officials about changes the potential buyers said were necessary to complete the $193 million deal and keep the team in Nashville.
